examples.example: 不管过了多久，我都会一直记得这段珍贵的友情。

translate.english: No matter how long it has passed, I will always remember this precious friendship.

examples.example: 无论要等待多久，我都坚信梦想终会实现。

translate.english: No matter how long it takes to wait, I firmly believe that the dream will eventually come true.

examples.example: 无论还要努力多久，我都相信成功就在前方。

translate.english: No matter how long I still have to work hard, I still believe that success is just ahead.
